title: 6 Fonts
content:
Ok, here are 6 fonts. How many can you get right?

Thanks. Appreciate it.

Eric

author: Lightswitch

comments.content:
Golly Gear

edit -- see post below by Renaissance Man. link provided!

Golly Gear is Maiandra Black by Dennis Pasternak, Galapagos Design, 1994, inspired by an early example of Oswald Cooper’s hand-lettering.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/galapagos/maiandra/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014063846/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/galapagos/maiandra/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/galapagos/maiandra/")

The same font under different names are rip-off/pirated versions.

You guys are the best. Wow. This is one my favorite forum websites for sure.

Thank you.

Eric

Steve, thanks for pointing that out.

hhp
